<div id="banner_ad">
    <script>
    var googletag = googletag || {};
    googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];

    var getUrlSegments = function (urlWithQueryString) {
        //chars not allowed in values in DFP ---> " ' = ! + # * ~ ; ^ () < > [ ] , & 
        urlWithQueryString = urlWithQueryString || window.location.href;

        var url = urlWithQueryString;
        var segmentsString;
        var dfpInvalidCharsRegex = /['=!#~;<>&\+\*\^\(\)\[\]\,\"]/g;
        var urlCharsRegex = /[:/?&=]/g;
        var spaceCharsRegex = /[ |\s]+/g;

        //separate segments 
        segmentsString = url.replace(urlCharsRegex, " ");

        //sanitize the string. remove characters that are not allowed in DFP 
        segmentsString = segmentsString.replace(dfpInvalidCharsRegex, " ");

        //replace multiple spaces with a single space 
        segmentsString = segmentsString.replace(spaceCharsRegex, " ");

        return segmentsString.trim().split(' ');
    }
    </script>

    <script>
    var gptAdSlots = [];
    googletag.cmd.push(function() {

    var mapping1 = googletag.sizeMapping().addSize([0, 0], [300, 50]).addSize([730, 600], [728, 90]).build();

    googletag.defineSlot('/15726702761/Desktop/asahq', [728, 90], 'div-gpt-ad-1499998198028-0').defineSizeMapping(mapping1).addService(googletag.pubads());
	   
    googletag.pubads().setTargeting("UrlSegments", getUrlSegments());
    googletag.enableServices();
    });
    </script>

    <div id='div-gpt-ad-1499998198028-0' class="dfpad">
        <script>
        googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1499998198028-0'); });
        </script>
    </div>

						<div class="callout secondary"><h6>In this Issue</h6><img src="/~/media/sites/asahq/images/components/sitecomponents/navigation/mega-menus/200x100apriljournal.jpg?h=100&amp;la=en&amp;w=200" alt="April Anesthesiology journal" width="200" height="100" /><p>Promoting scientific discovery and knowledge in perioperative, critical care, and pain medicine to advance patient care.</p><a href="http://anesthesiology.pubs.asahq.org/journal.aspx?_ga=2.155485567.554338047.1506354489-343968526.1458335914">Read the latest issue <span class="fa fa-chevron-right"></span></a></div>
					</ul>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div></li><li><a href="/resources"><span>Resources</span></a><div class="megamenu">
		<div class="inner_container">
			<div class="multi_cols three_columns clearfix">
				<div class="col col1">
					<ul>
						<li><a href="http://pubs.asahq.org">ASA Publications</a></li><li><a href="https://www.asahq.org/psh">Perioperative Surgical Home</a></li><li><a href="/quality-and-practice-management/standards-guidelines-and-related-resources-search">Standards Guidelines and Related Resources</a></li><li><a href="/resources/resources-from-asa-committees/committee-on-trauma-and-emergency-preparedness">Trauma and Emergency Preparedness</a></li><li><a href="/resources/ethics-and-professionalism">Ethics and Professionalism</a></li><li><a href="/resources/analytics-and-research-services">Analytics and Research Services</a></li>
					</ul>
				</div><div class="col col2">
					<ul>

					</ul>
				</div><div class="col col3">
					<ul>
						<div class="callout secondary"><img src="/~/media/sites/asahq/images/components/sitecomponents/navigation/mega-menus/pshgenerallogo260px.jpg?h=100&amp;la=en&amp;w=200" alt="Perioperative Surgical Home" width="200" height="100" /><p>Gain assistance in PSH Pilot implementation, optimization of a PSH Pilot, expansion of a PSH Pilot to new service lines or system-wide conversion. Applications are due April 15.</p><a href="https://www.asahq.org/psh/learning collaborative/learning collaborative 2">Learn more <span class="fa fa-chevron-right"></span></a></div>
					</ul>

        <!-- End Desktop Navigation -->

        <!-- Mobile Navigation -->
        
        <!-- End Mobile Navigation -->
    </div>

<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".siteSearchButton").click(function (e) {
            if ($("#site_search_query").css("opacity") != 0 && $(this).prev(".siteSearchBox").val().length > 0)
                siteSearch($(this).prev(".siteSearchBox").val());
        });

        $(".siteSearchBox").bind('keypress', function (e) {
            if (e.keyCode == 13) {
                siteSearch($(this).val());
				return false;
            }
        });
    });

    function siteSearch(input) {
        $(location)
            .attr('href', '/search' + '#q=' + input);
    }
</script>
<!-- End Navigation -->
        <!-- END NOINDEX -->

            <!-- End Col 4 -->
        </div>
        <!-- End Sitemap -->
    </div>
</div>
